function NPC_101000:Init( NPCID ) --[[ User Data 1: BreakPart 왼발 2: BreakPart 오른발 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 2 );
NPC_101000.BP_LeftAnkle = 2 NPC_101000.BP_RightAnkle = 3 NPC_101000.BP_AnkleHP = NPC_101000.MaxHP / 5
NPC_101000.TALENT_LeftStep_Slow = 210100013 NPC_101000.TALENT_LeftStep_Fast = 210100014 NPC_101000.TALENT_RightStep_Slow = 210100015 NPC_101000.TALENT_RightStep_Fast = 210100016 NPC_101000.TALENT_Pain1 = 210100001 NPC_101000.TALENT_Punch1 = 210100019 NPC_101000.TALENT_Punch2 = 210100021
end
function NPC_101000:LeftStep( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_101000.BP_LeftAnkle) then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_101000.TALENT_LeftStep_Fast, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_101000.TALENT_LeftStep_Slow, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_101000:RightStep( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_101000.BP_RightAnkle) then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_101000.TALENT_RightStep_Fast, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_101000.TALENT_RightStep_Slow, Enemy ) end end
-- Talent Callback Func function NPC_101000:OnFinishAndAggroSwap1( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "far", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_101000.TALENT_Punch1 ) then return end --ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101000.TALENT_Punch1 )
end function NPC_101000:OnFinishAndAggroSwap2( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "far", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_101000.TALENT_Punch2 ) then return end --ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101000.TALENT_Punch2 )
end
function NPC_101000:OnHitCapsule_1_3(HitInfo) -- 왼발 때릴 떄 return NPC_101000:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo) end function NPC_101000:OnHitCapsule_1_2(HitInfo) -- 오른발 때릴 때 return NPC_101000:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo) end function NPC_101000:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) -- 왼발 때릴 때 return NPC_101000:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo) end function NPC_101000:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) -- 오른발 때릴 때 return NPC_101000:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo) end function NPC_101000:OnHitCapsule_3_1(HitInfo) -- 왼발 때릴 때 return NPC_101000:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo) end function NPC_101000:OnHitCapsule_3_2(HitInfo) -- 오른발 때릴 때 return NPC_101000:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo) end
function NPC_101000:AccDamage( ThisNPC, nHitIdx, dHitInfo) -- 오른발을 계속 때리면 오른쪽 족쇄가 왼발을 때리면 왼발족쇄가 부숴진다
local LeftAccDamage -- 왼발 누적데미지 local RightAccDamage -- 오른발 누적데미지
if nHitIdx == 1 and (not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_101000.BP_LeftAnkle)) then -- 왼발 GLog("NPC_101000:AccDamage") LeftAccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + dHitInfo.Damage
if LeftAccDamage > NPC_101000.BP_AnkleHP then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101000.TALENT_Pain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, dHitInfo.Attacker) end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, LeftAccDamage )
elseif nHitIdx == 2 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_101000.BP_RightAnkle) then -- 오른발 RightAccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(2) + dHitInfo.Damage
if RightAccDamage > NPC_101000.BP_AnkleHP then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101000.TALENT_Pain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, dHitInfo.Attacker) end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, RightAccDamage ) end
return dHitInfo end
function NPC_101000:OnStartSummon( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 지진 더미 소환 --GLog( "NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness\n" ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) local Minion = AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( 101001, WorldPos ) AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetTarget( Minion ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( 210100110 )
end
